email_group_1.subject: Upcoming Mandatory Training Session
email_group_1.desc:
Dear Employee,

We are excited to announce an upcoming mandatory training session scheduled for next week. This training will cover essential topics that are critical for your personal development and compliance with company policies. The session will be held on Wednesday, March 15th, from 10 AM to 12 PM in the main conference room.

Please make sure to review the attached training document prior to the session. It contains important information that will help you prepare for the training. We encourage you to come with questions and be ready to engage in discussions.

If you have any conflicts with the scheduled time, please reach out to your manager as soon as possible.

Thank you for your attention to this important matter. We look forward to seeing you there!

Best regards,

HR Department
Company Name
hr@company.com
(123) 456-7890
email_group_1.explain: This email is from the HR department and contains a legitimate training attachment.
